title: Wu Hun Dalu
synopsis:
Scientist Chu Feng accidentally obtains the "Golden Crow Token," which fell as a meteorite. To investigate its origin, Chu Feng creates the supercomputer "Origin." With Origin's help, Chu Feng learns that the Golden Crow Token comes from a mysterious world called the Martial Soul Continent. Chu Feng also inadvertently activates the token's power and is transported to the Martial Soul Continent. There, Chu Feng rescues Su Manqing, the third young lady of the Su family, but in doing so, he incurs enmity with the Nangong and Lu families. To cope, Chu Feng quickly familiarizes himself with the martial arts of the Martial Soul Continent while constantly guarding against the Nangong family's schemes, overcoming crisis after crisis. However, gradually, the secret of Chu Feng possessing the Golden Crow Token is discovered by Su Yuwei, the patriarch of the Su family, and others, attracting the covetous eyes of various forces. After escaping a near-death experience, Chu Feng learns of the mysterious prophecy of the "Nine Golden Crow Tokens" from the token on Su Manqing's body. As Chu Feng delves deeper into the Golden Crow Token, the mastermind behind it all gradually emerges, and a secret concerning the survival of the Martial Soul Continent is being revealed…

(Source: Bangumi, translated)
